definition: cold pillow and lonely bed (idiom); fig. cold and solitary existence

sentences.english: Eight is for a nice warm bed.
If I do die before thee prithee, shroud me In one of those same sheets.
sentences.chinese: 要是我比你先死，请你就把那些被褥做我的殓衾。

sentences.english: Hern and I sat at two corners of the porch face to face, holding our blanket together.
sentences.chinese: 荷和我拥衾对坐，在廊子的两角，遥遥谈话。

sentences.english: I embroidered pillow, quilt with incense, with tears of deep dream.
sentences.chinese: 殇绣枕，怨香衾，梦痕同泪深。

sentences.english: HE and I were opposite each other, embracing the quilt in two corner of corridor, and chatting far away.
sentences.chinese: 荷和我拥衾对坐，在廊子的两角，遥遥谈话。

sentences.english: My bedfellow is cough and cramp; we sleep three in a bed.
sentences.chinese: 衾者是咳嗽与痉挛，咱们三个同睡一床。

sentences.english: Nor heaven peep through the blanket of the dark.
sentences.chinese: 让青天不能从黑暗的重衾里探出头来。

sentences.english: Alive we share the same bed.
Hold a Jade incense, lying in bed, alone bear the cold jade bed.
sentences.chinese: 拥着香衾，躺在玉床上，独自忍受玉床的冰凉。

definition: late at night/in the dead of night
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
cold pillow and lonely bed (idiom); fig. cold and solitary existence
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
